data.quote: Nothing is as bad or good as it first seems.
data.author: Idris Pukke

data.quote: We fight against a great opponent called future. Ghosts of the past won't stand a chance.
data.author: Nara Shikamaru

data.quote: Failing doesn’t give you a reason to give up, as long as you believe.
data.author: Masashi Kishimoto

data.quote: It’s just pathetic to give up on something before you even give it a shot.
data.author: Onio

data.quote: You can die anytime, but living takes true courage.
data.author: Nobuhiro Watsuki

data.quote: Life is not a game of luck. If you wanna win, work hard.
data.author: Yuu Kamiya
